column6:
"Morbius" part 1 (of 5),2006,5
The countdown to issue 100 begins here! Introducing the midnight monster you've been clamoring for-Ultimate Morbius! You won't believe the bite he takes out of the Ultimate Universe. And-Bugle reporter Ben Urich... a vampire?! You better believe it. It's the vampire bit-but as you've never seen it before!
32 PGS./Rated A ...$2.99
column8: | penciller (cover):Mark Bagley | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | inker:John Dell | letterer:Cory Petit | colorist:Justin Ponsor
